text.name: AGROSPONSOR_SP1
text.text: In partnership with JCB, ITRunner, Case, New Holland and other companies. /LF The AgroSponsor offers you a sponsorship of %s for the purchase of equipment and tools!/LF We hope your success with the AgroSponsor and Partners!

text.text: In exclusive partnership with JCB. /LF The AgroSponsor gives you a sponsorship of %s for the purchase of equipment and tools!

text.name: AGROSPONSOR_HELPR
text.text: Top prize that you can compete every day.

text.name: AGROSPONSOR_HELPDSP
